latimes-calculate¶

Some simple math we use to do journalism

Getting started¶

Install the latest package from pypi.

$ pip install latimes-calculate

Note

For most functions, there are no additional requirements. The exception is the small number of geospatial functions, which require GeoDjango.

  • Basic functions
    • Adjusted-monthly value
    • Age
    • At percentile
    • Benford’s Law
    • Competition rank

    • Median
    • Mode
    • Ordinal rank
    • Pearson’s r
    • Per capita
    • Per square mile
    • Percentage

    • Percentile

    • Standard deviation

  • Geospatial functions

    • Nudge points
    • Random point
